abstract: Jane E Brody Personal Health column reviews diagnosis and treatment for postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome, elusive condition that attacks autonomic nervous system, reducing bloodflow in teenagers.
snippet: POTS affects up to 1 percent of teenagers and causes symptoms including a racing heart, dizziness, extreme fatigue and headaches.
lead_paragraph: POTS affects up to 1 percent of teenagers and causes symptoms including a racing heart, dizziness, extreme fatigue and headaches.

headline.main: Ailment Can Steal Youth From the Young
headline.print_headline: Ailment Can Steal Youth From the Young
headline.seo: Postural Orthostatic Tachycardia Syndrome Can Steal Youth
